medical_history.chief_complaint: Nausea and lower abdominal pain with associated vomiting and diarrhea.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began at 7am on the day of admission, with nausea followed by non-bloody, bilious emesis occurring at least 7 times throughout the day. The patient also experienced non-bloody diarrhea and abdominal pain.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Asthma, obstructive sleep apnea, heartburn, arrhythmia, neurologic seizure at age ___, back pain, osteoarthritis, hyperlipidemia, vitamin D deficiency, vitamin B12 deficiency, iron deficiency.
